record.title: Highest Test Score
record.summary: Brian Lara — 400* on 10 April 2004 at Antigua (West Indies). Test cricket ka highest individual score.

record.title: Highest ODI Score
record.summary: Rohit Sharma — 264 on 13 Nov 2014 at Eden Gardens, Kolkata (IND vs SL). ODI ka highest individual score.

record.title: Most Test Runs (career)
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar — 15,921 runs (1989–2013). Multiple venues across career; all-time Test run leader.

record.title: Most ODI Runs (career)
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar — 18,426 runs (1989–2012). All-time ODI run leader.

record.title: Most Test Wickets (career)
record.summary: Muttiah Muralitharan — 800 wickets (1992–2010). Sri Lanka bowler; record across many Test venues.

record.title: Most ODI Wickets (career)
record.summary: Muttiah Muralitharan — 534 wickets (1993–2011). All-time ODI wickets leader.

record.title: Best Test Innings Bowling
record.summary: Jim Laker — 10/53 on 31 July 1956 at Old Trafford, Manchester (ENG vs AUS). Sirf 10-wicket innings ka record.

record.title: Best ODI Innings Bowling
record.summary: Chaminda Vaas — 8/19 on 8 Dec 2001 at Colombo (RPS) vs Zimbabwe. ODI mein best bowling figures.

record.title: Most Test Centuries
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar — 51 Test centuries (career). Record various grounds across career.

record.title: Most ODI Centuries
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar — 49 ODI centuries (career). Record across multiple venues.

record.title: Highest T20I Score
record.summary: Aaron Finch — 172 on 3 Jul 2018 at Manchester (AUS vs ENG) in T20I; ab tak ka highest T20I individual score.

record.title: Fastest Test Double Century
record.summary: Don Bradman/Maul? (historical variations) — TBD exact date/venue.

record.title: Most Runs in a Single Test Match
record.summary: Graham Gooch — 456 (1990) vs India at Lord's — Test match aggregate record.

record.title: Most Runs in a Single ODI Series
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar (2003 World Cup) / others — specifics vary; TBD.

record.title: Youngest Test Centurion
record.summary: Mushtaq Mohammad — young age; exact date/venue historical (TBD).

record.title: Oldest Test Centurion
record.summary: Jack Hobbs — old age century; exact details historical (TBD).

record.title: Most T20I Runs (career)
record.summary: Top T20I run-scorers change frequently — leader as of 2025 varies; mark as TBD.

record.title: Most T20I Sixes (career)
record.summary: Frequent updates — holder/venue/date: TBD.

record.title: Most Test Five-Wicket Hauls
record.summary: Muttiah Muralitharan — sabse zyada five-wicket hauls (exact count varies by source); career across many venues.

record.title: Most ODI Five-Wicket Hauls
record.summary: Waqar Younis / Brett Lee / others — exact top count and date: TBD.

record.title: Most Dismissals by Wicketkeeper (Tests)
record.summary: Mark Boucher — record keeper dismissals (career); matches across South Africa and worldwide.

record.title: Most Dismissals by Wicketkeeper (ODIs)
record.summary: Kumar Sangakkara / MS Dhoni — top keepers; exact counts/date: TBD.

record.title: Most Catches by a Non-keeper (Tests)
record.summary: Rahul Dravid / Mahela Jayawardene — leaders; exact numbers/venues: TBD.

record.title: Most Catches by a Non-keeper (ODIs)
record.summary: Mahela Jayawardene / Rahul Dravid — leaders; exact numbers: TBD.

record.title: Highest Partnership (Test innings)
record.summary: Sri Lanka/England historical big partnership — specifics vary; TBD.

record.title: Highest Partnership (ODI innings)
record.summary: Chris Gayle / Marlon Samuels? or others — specifics TBD.

record.title: Most Career Matches (All formats)
record.summary: Sachin Tendulkar / other long-career players — exact aggregate matches: TBD.

record.title: Most Sixes in an ODI Innings
record.summary: Rohit Sharma / others — specific innings/top sixes: TBD.

record.title: Fastest ODI Hundred (balls)
record.summary: AB de Villiers — 31 balls (vs West Indies, 2015) at Johannesburg? (Actually vs WI in 2015 at Johannesburg).

record.title: Fastest T20I Hundred (balls)
record.summary: David Miller / Rohit/Kieron Pollard records vary; exact holder/venue: TBD.
